post.text: The corrupt establishment knows that we are a great threat to their criminal enterprise. We will NOT let them decide our future â€“ YOU, the American people will decide OUR future!

comment.author: Tori
comment.text: I'm going to wear red on Nov 8th, and plan on spending a few hours at my polling place, recording and taking an exit poll.

replies.author: Tori
replies.text: Alyssa :) :) :) Maybe, but I will have a recording of how my precinct voted and will be watching for voter fraud :) :) :)
